participant_1.background:
I prefer to be comfortable and not draw much attention to myself.
i love cooking.
I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics.
i am in love with adam levine.
I used to want to serve my country, but now I'm happily employed at a bank.

participant_2.background:
I am a teacher and I love listening to music in the shower.
i really wanted to be an actor.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes.
I am proud of my first home purchase.
I just finished practicing my bass guitar in the lifeguard station.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love listening to music in the shower and playing bass guitar.
Nice! I love to cook and I am in love with Adam Levine!
Oh my goodness! Adam Levine is so hot! What's your favorite song by him?
I love "She Will Be Loved". It's so beautiful! What do you like to cook?
I like to cook a lot of different kinds of food. I love making pasta and pizza.
That sounds delicious! I love pizza. I'm not much of a cook, but I love to eat.
Hey, no worries! I love to cook for people. Maybe I could cook you dinner sometime.
That would be awesome! I'm free on Friday night.
Perfect! I'll bring the pizza and you bring the wine!
Sounds like a plan! I'm excited!
Me too! I'll see you on Friday!
